Hi

You can actually change the TestRunner.java file to save screen output to a
file ( i.e. TestResults ).

I have modified and using the file TestRunner.java ( Attached with this
email). It creates a TestResults.txt file and also it will show you on the
screen.

Thanks
Babu

-----Original Message-----
From: marciofreitas@... [mailto:marciofreitas@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 13, 2001 9:37 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Print to file


Hello,

Somebody know if JUnit print errors  and fails to a file ?

If yes, how i make this?

Thanks,
